verses.verse: As David's <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H7126>drew<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> therefore, and <S%H1961>show<s%> yourself a <S%H376>man.<s%>

"And <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> His <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and His <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> according to what is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that you may <S%H7919>succeed<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6213>do<s%> and <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H6437>turn,<s%>

<S%H4616>so<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may <S%H6965>carry<s%> out His <S%H1697>promise<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>'If<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H8104>careful<s%> of their <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me in <S%H571>truth<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5315>soul,<s%> you shall not <S%H3772>lack<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

"Now you <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to me, <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> and to <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> whom he <S%H2026>killed;<s%> he also <S%H7760>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> And he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> on his <S%H9118>belt<s%> about his <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and on his <S%H5275>sandals<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
"So <S%H6213>act<s%> according to your <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and do not let his <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>hair<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

"But <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and let them be among those who <S%H398>eat<s%> at your <S%H7979>table;<s%> for they <S%H7126>assisted<s%> me when I <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H53>Absalom<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there is with you <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera<s%> the <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of <S%H980>Bahurim;<s%> now it was he who <S%H7043>cursed<s%> me with a <S%H4834>violent<s%> <S%H7045>curse<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim.<s%> But when he <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7122><s%> to me at the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I will not <S%H4191>put<s%> you to <S%H4191>death<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, do not let him <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> for you are a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you ought to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him, and you will <S%H3381>bring<s%> his <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>hair<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>"
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers and was <S%H1>buried<s%> in the <S%H6912>city<s%> of <S%H5892>David.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [were] <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and thirty-three <S%H8141>years<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his father, and his <S%H1>kingdom<s%> was <S%H4438>firmly<s%> <S%H3966>established.<s%>

Now <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peacefully<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peacefully.<s%>"
Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H1697>something<s%> [to say] to you." And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>"Speak.<s%>"

So he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> was mine and that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7760>expected<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me to be <S%H4427>king;<s%> however, the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> has <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> and <S%H1961>become<s%> my brother's, for it was his from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"And <S%H6258>now<s%> I am <S%H7592>making<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7596>request<s%> of you; do not <S%H7725>refuse<s%> me." And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1696>"Speak.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> for he will not <S%H7725>refuse<s%> you, that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"
And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2896>"Very<s%> <S%H2896>well;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> for you."

So <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him for <S%H138>Adonijah.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> her, <S%H7812>bowed<s%> before her, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> then he had a <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> for the king's <S%H517>mother,<s%> and she <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3225>right.<s%>

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H7592>making<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7596>request<s%> of you; do not <S%H7725>refuse<s%> me." And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H7592>"Ask,<s%> my <S%H517>mother,<s%> for I will not <S%H7725>refuse<s%> you."
So she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> "And <S%H4100>why<s%> are you <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> for <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>? <S%H7592>Ask<s%> for him also the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> – for he is my <S%H1419>older<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> – even for him, for <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah!<s%>"

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "May <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> to me and <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3541>also,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> against his own <S%H5315>life.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H3559>established<s%> me and <S%H3427>set<s%> me on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my father, and <S%H1>who<s%> has <S%H834>made<s%> me a <S%H6213>house<s%> as He <S%H1004>promised,<s%> <S%H1696>surely<s%> <S%H3588>Adonijah<s%> will be <S%H138>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H4191>today.<s%>"
So <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada;<s%> and he <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon him so that he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

Then to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> to <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> to your own <S%H7704>field,<s%> for you <S%H376>deserve<s%> to <S%H4194>die;<s%> but I will not <S%H4191>put<s%> you to <S%H4191>death<s%> at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my father <S%H1>David,<s%> and <S%H1732>because<s%> you were <S%H3588>afflicted<s%> in <S%H6031>everything<s%> with <S%H3605>which<s%> my father was <S%H834>afflicted.<s%>"

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1644>dismissed<s%> <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> from <S%H1961>being<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in order to <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

Now the <S%H8052>news<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> had <S%H5186>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> although he had not <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H5186><s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%> And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H2388>took<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> that <S%H3097>Joab<s%> had <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon him."

So <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3318>'Come<s%> out.'" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%> for I will <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%>" And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H3541>thus<s%> he <S%H6030>answered<s%> me."

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6213>"Do<s%> as he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon him and <S%H6912>bury<s%> him, that you may <S%H5493>remove<s%> from me and from my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> he <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he and <S%H2026>killed<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> while my father <S%H1>David<s%> did not <S%H1732>know<s%> [it: ] <S%H3045>Abner<s%> the <S%H74>son<s%> of <S%H1121>Ner,<s%> <S%H5369>commander<s%> of the <S%H8269>army<s%> of <S%H6635>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3478>Amasa<s%> the <S%H6021>son<s%> of <S%H1121>Jether,<s%> <S%H3500>commander<s%> of the <S%H8269>army<s%> of <S%H6635>Judah.<s%>

"So shall their <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> but to <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> may there be <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"

Then <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon him and <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and he was <S%H6912>buried<s%> at his own <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>appointed<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>army<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>appointed<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar.<s%>

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1129>"Build<s%> for yourself a <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and do not <S%H3318>go<s%> out from <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H575>any<s%> <S%H575>place.<s%>

"For it will <S%H1961>happen<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> you will <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>"

<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "The <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> As my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H6213>do.<s%>" So <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

But it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H1272>ran<s%> <S%H1272>away<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> And they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>"

Then <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> to <S%H1245>look<s%> for his <S%H5650>servants.<s%> And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> from <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> that <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and had <S%H7725>returned.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Did I not make you <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>warn<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You will <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H3318>depart<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H575>anywhere,<s%> you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>'? And you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'The <S%H1697>word<s%> which I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>'
<S%H4069>"Why<s%> then have you not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H4687>command<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>laid<s%> on you?"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> "You <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6213>did<s%> to my father <S%H1>David;<s%> therefore the <S%H1732>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3068>return<s%> your <S%H7725>evil<s%> on your own <S%H9567>head.<s%>

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> and he <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon him so that he <S%H4191>died.<s%> Thus the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>
